Package com.hexaware.dao

Class OrderProcessorRepositoryImpl

java.lang.Object
com.hexaware.dao.OrderProcessorRepositoryImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
OrderProcessorRepository
public class OrderProcessorRepositoryImpl extends Object implements OrderProcessorRepository
Implementation of OrderProcessorRepository interface for handling database operations.
